description: Create a new AI chat conversation. Accepts optional CreateAIChatInput with title (optional, String, max 255 chars). Returns AIChat with uuid, title (auto-generated if not provided: 'New Chat YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM'), createdAt, updatedAt. Uses Lambda AI service for chat management. User isolation enforced. Raises ForbiddenError (403) if user is not ProUser or higher.
graphql_operation: mutation CreateAIChat($input: CreateAIChatInput) { aiChats { createChat(input: $input) { uuid title createdAt } } }
